channel.title: Another slight issue lol :\
channel.description:
I'm trying to move NPCs (the npc's that are the shops) from the current place to a different place.
I've done this before and I believe it either had to do with global objects or it was in the NPC handler. However, I cannot find these NPCs anywhere. They just don't show up. I'm using TrisidiaX if that helps.

item.title: Another slight issue lol :\
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Check the height, usually should be 0.

Read full topic

item.title: Another slight issue lol :\
item.dc:creator: @k2_k0 k2 k0
item.description:
@k2_k0 wrote:

TrinsidiaX is a terrible source mate its so messy. But in data/cfg/ there should be a .cfg name spawn-config, that is where npc spawns are placed. look there.

Read full topic
